description: Fired when an actor's mood or sexual state is updated by the MoodPersistenceService. This event is dispatched after the mood/sexual state components have been modified on the entity.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:mood_state_updated' event payload.

actorId.description: The ID of the actor whose mood or sexual state was updated.

moodUpdate.description: The mood axis values that were updated (valence, arousal, threat, etc.), or null if only sexual state was updated.

sexualUpdate.description: The sexual state values that were updated (sex_excitation, sex_inhibition, etc.), or null if only mood was updated.
